parameters.name: BackupId
parameters.description: The ID of the backup set.

parameters.name: BackupStatus
parameters.description:
The status of the backup set. Valid values:

*   **Success**
*   **Failed**

parameters.name: DBInstanceId
parameters.description: The instance ID. You can call the DescribeDBInstances operation to query the instance ID.

parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description:
The end of the time range to query. The end time must be later than the start time.

Specify the time in the ISO 8601 standard in the *yyyy-MM-dd*T*HH:mm*Z format. The time must be in UTC.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description:
The page number. Pages start from page 1.

> The default value is 1.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description:
The number of entries per page. Valid values:

*   **30**
*   **50**
*   **100**

> The default value is **30**.

parameters.name: Region
parameters.description: The region ID of the instance.

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the resource group.

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description:
The beginning of the time range to query.

Specify the time in the ISO 8601 standard in the *yyyy-MM-dd*T*HH:mm*Z format. The time must be in UTC.
